quotes.quote: You couldn't erase the past. You couldn't even change it. But sometimes life offered you the opportunity to put it right.
The past, has been erased; the present, forgiven; and the future, redeemed.
This kind of forgetting does not erase memory, it lays the emotion surrounding the memory to rest.
Life is like writing with a pen. You can cross out your past but you can't erase it.
One cannot and must not try to erase the past merely because it does not fit the present.
Time may heal all wounds, but it does not erase the scars.
Sometimes even a thousand waves hitting the shore continuously one after the other also can't erase few footprints on the seashore.
Failure isn't an option. I've erased the word 'fear' from my vocabulary, and I think when you erase fear, you can't fail.
History will be erased in the universal purgatory.
No doubt, you may leave me physically, but it is impossible to erase the memories of you from my heart and mind.
What the eyes had seen could not be erased.
We cannot erase the past, but we can accept it as history.
You can hide memories, but you can’t erase the history that produced them.
The past can never be erased. It is always going to be there.
Either you're the one erasing or you're the one being erased.
Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.

Forgiving does not erase the bitter past. A healed memory is not a deleted memory. Instead, forgiving what we cannot forget creates a new way to remember. We change the memory of our past into a hope for our future.
I can only wait for the final amnesia, the one that can erase an entire life.
When history is erased, people's moral values are also erased.
My phone's backspace key has erased more things than I have ever said in my life.
You can't erase a dream, you can only wake me up.
I'm the one erased. Or I guess I'm not even that, because the thing about being erased is that first you have to leave a mark.
You can't erase what you know. You can't forget who you are.
We cannot go backward. We cannot erase time and events. But we can go forward, hand in hand, hope in our hearts and love lighting our way.
Hatred will never be erased! The only thing you can do... is erase the ones you hate.
The more you try to erase me The more, the more The more that I appear.
Nothing erases the past. There is repentance, there is atonement, and there is forgiveness. That is all, but that is enough.
Regrets never sit well, with those that never forget.
I am the author of my life. Unfortunately, I am writing in pen and can’t erase my mistakes.
A thousand years will pass and the guilt of Germany will not be erased.
Once you read something, you can't erase it from your brain.
Becoming a parent erased many of my negative childhood feelings and filled them in with something new.
The past is a great place and I don't want to erase it or to regret it, but I don't want to be its prisoner either.
